name: 36 Fragments of Midnight
description: In this procedurally generated platform game, you have to collect all the Star Fragments of Midnight's friends to get of their greatest gift.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
